column4: Hi, in 8.10, I'm trying to find out a way to sync emails in Evolution so other clients don't see messages as unread when I've in fact read them on Evolution. How can this be done?
you normally set it on the email server, there is a option like "keep email on server"
I was using thunderbird, which did it successfully. for example, when I read mail in evolution, my iphone still displays it as unread. it's very annoying.
